panels.description: Percentage of FC messages in local hub relative to last known peer. May fluctuate as peers change.
panels.title: Message Sync %

panels.description: Number of blocks being processed for Farcaster Contract events
panels.title: Blocks Processed

panels.description: Number of Farcaster Messages stored in the DB. Increases and decreases when users add or delete data.
panels.title: Farcaster Messages

panels.description: Number of gossip messages received from peers
panels.title: Incoming Gossip

panels.description: Peers with open inbound connections. Requires port 2282 to be open. Gossip works even without inbound connections, but not having any may affect your peer score and network health.

0.text: No Incoming Connection. Gossip port not open?

panels.title: Inbound Gossip Connections

panels.description: Number of peers that Hubble is connected with for outbound and inbound flow.
panels.title: Gossip Peers

panels.description: Time taken to perform a diff sync which fetches all unknown messages from a peer over grpc.  Happens every two minutes unless a sync is already running.

defaults.noValue: Waiting for first sync to complete

panels.title: Sync Duration

panels.description: Successful inbound syncs from peers. Requires port 2283 to be open. Outbound sync works even if the port is closed but it may affect your peer reputation score and network health.

0.text: No Incoming Connections! Are your ports open?

defaults.noValue: No Incoming Connections! Are your ports open?

panels.title: Inbound Sync Attempts

panels.description: Number of peers blocked due to bad peer reputation scores.
panels.title: Blocked Peers

panels.description: Time taken to merge a newly received message into the Hub's DB
panels.title: Merge Latency

panels.description: Number of messages waiting in queue to be merged
panels.title: Merge Queue Size

panels.description: Number of messages waiting to be added to the merkle sync trie.
panels.title: Merkle Trie Queue Size
